::: {.notes}

1. location of software installation should not matter (select PATH if given the option)
2. other languages are permissable ([Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/) & [Julia](https://julialang.org/install/) currently popular)
3. other IDEs are permissable ([VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/download), [Positron](https://positron.posit.co/), and [JupyterLab](https://jupyter.org/install) currently popular)

:::
